patterns_discovered.description: Separation of client-side providers into dedicated component file rather than mixing in root layout
patterns_discovered.benefit: Cleaner architecture, easier to extend with additional providers, maintains separation of concerns

patterns_discovered.description: Reformatted entire layout.tsx to use double quotes and semicolons consistently
patterns_discovered.benefit: Enforces project-wide code style consistency, likely via linter/formatter like Prettier

patterns_discovered.description: ProvidersProps interface defined explicitly for type safety
patterns_discovered.benefit: Better IDE support, self-documenting code, prevents prop type errors

gotchas_discovered.description: 'use client' directive in providers.tsx means all children become client components
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: This is intentional - Clerk requires client-side context; design other components accordingly
gotchas_discovered.impact: Any server-only features need to be isolated above the Providers component

gotchas_discovered.description: ClerkProvider implementation shown but no environment variables or API key configuration shown in diff
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Ensure NEXT_PUBLIC_CLERK_PUBLISHABLE_KEY and CLERK_SECRET_KEY are set in .env.local
gotchas_discovered.impact: Application will fail at runtime if Clerk keys are not properly configured

gotchas_discovered.description: Providers component has no error handling or fallback for Clerk initialization failures
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Consider adding error boundary wrapper or Clerk error handling in future iterations
gotchas_discovered.impact: Runtime errors in Clerk initialization could crash entire application
